mapper.select: SELECT f.id as feedId, u.id as userId, u.name as userName, u.email as userEmail, u.role as userRole, f.content as content, f.created_at as createdAt, f.updated_at as updatedAt FROM feed_comment f JOIN User u ON f.uid = u.uid WHERE f.feed_id = #{feedId} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY f.ID DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT count(*) FROM feed_comment WHERE feed_id = #{feedId} AND deleted = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO feed_comment(feed_id, uid, content) VALUES (#{feedId}, #{uid}, #{content})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM feed_comment WHERE id = #{id} AND uid = #{uid}
